name: Spiky Islands
description:
Game about jumping from one dangerous island to another.

Theme for this game was "ONE TIME USE"

I made this game in 3 hours, and here will be video about that: 

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQAv2gThrv7RhPi-ebWRa6A

I used music from: https://opengameart.org/content/adventure-time-revised (very cool)
